title: wiki: iOS example build instructions need more setup info
body:
The docs are here:
https://github.com/golang/go/wiki/Mobile

Buildng for IOS hit a few newbie roadblocks.
Building for Android is nice and simple.

The bash shell below shows what i mean.

gedw99-MacBook-Pro:example apple$ gomobile build -target=android golang.org/x/mobile/example/basic
gedw99-MacBook-Pro:example apple$ gomobile build -target=ios golang.org/x/mobile/example/basic
gomobile: xcrun xcodebuild -configuration Release -project /var/folders/wp/ff6sz9qs6g71jnm12nj2kbyw0000gp/T/gomobile-work-025102198/main.xcodeproj failed: exit status 65
=== BUILD TARGET main OF PROJECT main WITH CONFIGURATION Release ===

Check dependencies
Code Sign error: No code signing identities found: No valid signing identities (i.e. certificate and private key pair) matching the team ID “(null)” were found.
CodeSign error: code signing is required for product type 'Application' in SDK 'iOS 8.4'

** BUILD FAILED **


The following build commands failed:
	Check dependencies
(1 failure)
